TestDescription.name: Windows Terminal Services server running
TestDescription.Description: A Windows Terminal Services server is running on this host. Terminal Services is one of the components of Microsoft Windows (both server and client versions) that allows a user to access applications and data on a remote computer. Microsoft's RDP implementation of Terminal Services doesn't verify the server's identity when setting up the encryption keys for the RDP session. This vulnerability can result in a potential man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.
TestDescription.Recommendation: It's recommended to restrict access to valid users and/or hosts.
